name: Orichalcos Aristeros
text: Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. Must be Special Summoned with "Orichalcos Shunoros", and cannot be Special Summoned by other ways. Cannot be destroyed while you control a "Orichalcos Shunoros". If an opponent's monster declares an attack: Change the attack target to this card and the DEF of this card becomes equal to the ATK of the attacking monster + 300 during the Damage Step only. After damage calculation, 1 "Orichalcos Shunoros" you control loses ATK equal to the DEF this card had during the Damage Step. If "Orichalcos Shunoros" leaves the field: Destroy this card.
